---
title: vela env ls
---

List environments for vela applications to run.

### Synopsis

List all environments for vela applications to run.

```
vela env ls
```

### Examples

```
vela env ls [env-name]
```

### Options

```
  -h, --help   help for ls
```

* [vela env](vela_env)	 - Manage environments for vela applications to run.
